DOC.brief_summary: The aim of this study is to propose infection prophylaxis from Asian multinational retrospective analysis of infectious complications in patients who were treated with alemtuzumab
DOC.brief_title: Infections Associated With the Use of Alemtuzumab
DOC.criteria: Patients received alemtuzumab as a treatment for hematologic malignancy ex. nonHodgkin lymphoma Acute myeloid leukemia Aplastic anemia Patients did not receive alemtuzumab
